flawed_nl_solution:
At a germination rate of 60/100, 25 seeds will yield 60/100*25=<<60/100*25=125/3>>125/3 plants.
At a germination rate of 80/100, 25 seeds will yield 80/100*25=<<80/100*25=20>>20 plants.
In total, she will have grown 125/3+20=<<125/3+20=185/3>>185/3 plants.
If 80/100 of the plants developed flowers, then she will have grown (80/100)*185/3=<<(80/100)*185/3=148/3>>148/3 plants that produce flowers.
#### 148/3

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 125/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
